content: free pattern on the blog the casey set is a set of his and hers scarves which are perfect for donating gifting or making for yourself they require #4 weight yarn and a 6mm hook to give them bounce and that squishiness that you just love to touch whilst also being perfect for keeping you warm on those fresh autumn walks or chillier winter days each stitch used has a right and a left handed video tutorial to go with them as well as written instructions so this is a great project for a confident beginner or an experienced crocheter my scarf measure 60 long and 7 5 female or 9 male but you can very easily amend these sizes to suit your requirements or preferences all of our patterns are tested by experienced crocheters if you would like help and support you can email us email on the pattern or if you would like to join our group of friendly crocheters then you can find us on fb at https //www facebook com/groups/851570451884519 or sign up to our newsletter at www sunflowercottagecrochet com
